sentence.Network_en: White was both visionary and rationalist.
sentence.Network_cn: 怀特既有远见又充满理性。

sentence.Network_en: The rationalist finally will be of dogmatic temper in his affirmations.
sentence.Network_cn: 最后,理性主义者在断言时总带些武断性的气质.
我仍是一位执迷不悟的理性主义者.

list.abs: 哲理性,philosophy,... ... ) philosophic theory 哲理性 ) rationalistic philosophy 理性哲学 ) philosophical reason 哲学理性.

...完全用物理一化学来解释。他一方面避免陷入活力论，另一方面又摆脱了还原论的局限。宏观与微观相结合，理论与实验相结合，为生理学乃至生物学的发展建立了良好研究方式。他们的这种方式被认为是唯理主义科学观(rationalistic science)的重要组成部分。他们是整体唯物主义者，他们坚信事物起因的物质性，并且强调探索系统中各组成部分之间的相互联系。一般认为内稳态理论是现代生理学建立的标志，也是生理学进一步发展的基础。进.
rationalist approach的中文解释沪江词库精选rationalist approach是什么意思、英语短语。rationalist approach的中文释义: 理性主义方法相关短语.
rationalism 理性主义rationalistic method 推理法rationalists 唯理主义者

entry.tran: 理性主义者的;理性至上者的
entry.def: If you describe someone as rationalist, you mean that their beliefs are based on reason and logic rather than emotion or religion.

example.tran: 理性主义哲学家拉卡托斯

example.ex: ...the rationalist and liberal ideas of the nineteenth century...
example.tran: 19世纪的理性主义和自由主义观点

entry.def: If you describe someone as a rationalist, you mean that they base their life on rationalist beliefs.

means.word_mean: 1. someone who emphasizes observable facts and excludes metaphysical speculation about origins or ultimate causes
1. of or relating to or characteristic of rationalism;
